description: A tall tower/mansion on Thriller Bark island that serves as Dr. Hogback's laboratory and living quarters. This is where Hogback performs his experiments on corpses and creates zombies for Gecko Moria. The tower contains multiple floors including laboratory spaces, living areas, and windows high enough to be dangerous when zombies are ordered to jump from them.

keyEvents.title: Chopper and Robin vs. Jigoro and Inuppe
keyEvents.description: The battle between Chopper, Robin and the two powerful zombies continues within Hogback's tower.
keyEvents.significance: Primary location for the episode's main confrontation.

keyEvents.title: Hogback Reveals His Past with Cindry
keyEvents.description: Hogback reveals his unrequited love for Cindry and his pact with Moria inside his tower.
keyEvents.significance: The setting where Hogback's dark secrets are exposed.

keyEvents.title: Chopper's Declaration About True Life
keyEvents.description: Chopper makes his passionate declaration about what it means to be truly alive in confrontation with Hogback.
keyEvents.significance: The location of one of Chopper's most defining character moments.

keyEvents.title: Robin Tricks Hogback, Zombies Jump from Tower
keyEvents.description: Robin manipulates Hogback into ordering Jigoro and Inuppe to jump from the tower window, with classical music playing as they fall.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the tower's height and the complete obedience of zombies to their master.

keyEvents.title: Cindry's Consciousness Awakens
keyEvents.description: Inside the tower, Cindry's original consciousness briefly surfaces and she refuses to obey Hogback's command.
keyEvents.significance: A profound moment showing the remnants of humanity within the zombies.

statusHistory.reason: Actively used as Hogback's laboratory and residence during Thriller Bark arc
